title: Automation wallet state
subtitle: Quickly verify if your automation wallet is active and funded
body:
From the contextual menu under the automation icon on the menubar, you'll be able to enable/disable the automation.

You can quickly asses the automation wallet state by looking at the icon:

- the automation is enabled if the icon has a colored background

- the wallet is completely funded if the top right indicator is green, partially funded if the indicator is yellow, and insufficient funded if the indicator is red.
